In this turn based fighting game, your goal is to defeat all of your opponent\'s cards. Pick cards that synergize together or are strong agaisnt the ones your opponent picked. The starting player is decided randomy and will be able to use their character\'s abilities. Once all possible actions have been performed, the other player\'s turn will start.

Every Character has 3 abilities. The active ability is used by dragging the attacking card onto an opposing card and release when the red tint appears.
Passive abilities are used on allies by dragging and letting go when the green tint appears.
To make a character perform their active ability on themselves, drag the selection out and then back in onto the acting card. Stop dragging when not hovering a card to cancel the action.
Ultimate abilities can be used when the rage bar is full, by dragging the flame onto the character whose ultimate you want to use. When a cyan outline appears, it means that dropping the flame onto that character will make it perform their ultimate.

Every team has a rage bar that increases by 5% after a player performs an active or passive ability.\nRage can be influenced by other factors such as weather events or traits.\nWhen the rage bar is full it will begin pulsating and the flame icon used to perform ultimate abilities appear.
Effects influence how a character behave, and last a certain number of turns.\nPositive effects are shown in green, and negative ones in purple.
Traits are similar to effects, except they are tied to specific characters and cannot be applied or removed.\nThey can either be beneficial or limit a character\'s power.

"Double tap a card to view its details.
Clicking on its name or stats will open a radar menu that visualizes the character's strengths and weaknesses.
The info card also displays the character's abilities, traits and current active effects.
If a character's ability description contains an effect, tap the text to see what the effect does. "

Some abilities and traits have charges, which means that they can\'t be performed immediatley and will instead charge when used on a character.\nAbility charges reset when switching between passive and active abilities.\nActive charges are visualized by green bars, passive charges are blue, and trait charges are purple.

When a character performs an ability, their team gains 3 coins. Additional coins can be obtained from other game events like traits and effects.\nCoins can be spent at the shop during only in your turn. Buy an item by dragging it and releasing it onto the character you want to use it on.
By enabling weather, a random weather modifier occurs during battle, granting a team with equal positive or negative effects.
In Timed Mode, you have a limited amount of time to make your moves each turn.\nIf you don\'t do anything, a random character will use its active or passive ability on a random character.
Attack the target %s times and deal %s damage

Totems are simpler character cards that can be purchased at the shop.
Your team can only have one totem at a time. If a totem is destroyed, you can buy another one at the shop.
Totems can perform active and passive abilities, but cannot perform ultimates, have effects or traits.
Totems cannot be targeted by abilities, but loose health when any team member takes damage. They do not regenerate health if a team member is healed.
